Pre-Game Insights: Denver Nuggets (3-3) will face Oklahoma City Thunder (7-0) in a conference matchup.
The BETMGM SPORTSBOOK line favors the Thunder by 3.5 points, with an over/under of 222.
Others: The Nuggets went 57-25 overall, 10-6 in Northwest Division action and 33-8 at home last season.
The Thunder went 57-25 overall, 12-4 in Northwest Division play and 24-17 on the road last season.
Injury updates: Vlatko Cancar, Jamal Murray, DaRon Holmes II are day-to-day for the Nuggets, while Kenrich Williams, Isaiah Hartenstein, Jaylin Williams, Nikola Topic are out for the Thunder.
